issue.title: [C++] GCS integration tests leak processes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14979](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14979). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The GCS integration tests fail to fully shutdown all the processes created to run the GCS testbench.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14979?focusedCommentId=17454708) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11852
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11852>
